auto_trigger.description: Specifies whether to automatically trigger the replication.

destination_project_id.description: Specifies the ID of the destination project to which the backup is to be copied.

destination_region.description: Specifies the ID of the destination region to which the backup is to be copied.

destination_vault_id.description: Specifies the ID of the destination vault to which the backup is to be copied.

enable_acceleration.description: Specifies whether to enable acceleration for cross-region replication.

region.description: Specifies the region in which to create the resource. If omitted, the provider-level region will be used.

vault_id.description: Specifies the ID of the source vault.
